species.name: scraggy
descriptions: If it locks eyes with you, watch out! Nothing and no one is safe from the reckless headbutts of this troublesome Pokémon.
It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.
It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has completely stretched out.
Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
It stretches its saggy skin up to its neck to protect itself. The saggier their skin, the more respect they garner.

abilities.name: shed-skin
abilities.effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.
